Ingridients: 200g boneless chicken breast, 2 cups mixed salad greens, 1 cucumber, 1 tomato, 1 red onion, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon tandoori spice blend, Salt, Pepper, Lemon wedges
Method: 1. Marinate chicken with tandoori spice blend, salt, and pepper. 2. Grill the chicken until fully cooked. 3. In a salad bowl, combine greens, cucumber, tomato, and red onion. 4. Slice grilled chicken and place on top of the salad. 5. Drizzle with olive oil and garnish with lemon wedges.

Ingridients: 1 cup chickpeas, 2 cups spinach, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon ginger, 1 teaspoon cumin powder, 1 teaspoon coriander powder, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1/2 teaspoon red chili powder, 1 tablespoon oil, Salt
Method: 1. Heat oil, sauté onions until golden brown. 2. Add minced garlic and grated ginger. 3. Add cumin, coriander, turmeric, and red chili powder. 4. Pour in tomato puree, cook until oil separates. 5. Add cooked chickpeas and chopped spinach. 6. Season with salt and simmer for 5 minutes.

Recepie: Cabbage and Carrot Stir-Fry with Tofu
Ingridients: 2 cups shredded cabbage, 1 cup julienned carrots, 200g firm tofu, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 1 teaspoon ginger, 2 cloves garlic, 1 green onion, Salt, Pepper
Method: 1. Heat sesame oil, sauté ginger and garlic until fragrant. 2. Add cubed tofu, stir-fry until golden brown. 3. Add shredded cabbage, julienned carrots, soy sauce, salt, and pepper. 4. Stir-fry until vegetables are crisp-tender. 5. Garnish with sliced green onions.

Recepie: Brown Rice and Mixed Vegetable Pulao
Ingridients: 1 cup brown rice (cooked), 1/2 cup mixed vegetables (peas, carrots, beans), 1 onion (sliced), 1/2 cup bell peppers (sliced), 1 teaspoon cumin seeds, 1 teaspoon garam masala, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1 tablespoon oil, Salt to taste, Fresh coriander for garnish
Method: 1. In a pan, heat oil and add cumin seeds. 2. Sauté sliced onions until golden. 3. Add mixed vegetables and bell peppers, cook until slightly tender. 4. Stir in cooked brown rice, garam masala, turmeric, and salt. 5. Mix well and garnish with fresh coriander.

Ingridients: 1 small cauliflower, 1 cup mixed vegetables (peas, carrots, beans), 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 1/2 cup yogurt, 1/4 cup chopped mint leaves, 1/4 cup chopped cilantro, 1 tablespoon ghee, 1 teaspoon ginger-garlic paste, 1 teaspoon cumin seeds, 1 teaspoon biryani masala, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1/2 teaspoon red chili powder, Salt to taste
Method: 1. Grate cauliflower to resemble rice. 2. Sauté cumin seeds in ghee, add onions and ginger-garlic paste. 3. Add tomatoes, mixed vegetables, and spices. 4. Stir in cauliflower rice, yogurt, and herbs. 5. Cook until vegetables are tender. 6. Season

Ingridients: 2 large eggplants, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 1 green chili, 1 teaspoon ginger-garlic paste, 1/2 teaspoon cumin seeds, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1 teaspoon coriander powder, 1/2 teaspoon red chili powder, 1/2 teaspoon garam masala, 2 tablespoons oil, Fresh coriander for garnish, Salt
Method: 1. Roast the eggplants until charred, then peel and mash the flesh. 2. In a pan, heat oil, add cumin seeds. 3. Sauté chopped onions until golden brown. 4. Add ginger-garlic paste, green chili, and sauté for a minute. 5. Add chopped tomatoes, cook until soft and oil separates. 6. Add turmeric, coriander, red chili powder, and garam masala. 7. Stir in mashed eggplant, cook for 5-7 minutes. 8. Season with salt and garnish with fresh coriander.
